alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 28 at 2:38PM MST until July 28 at 5:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Areas near and along the Tonto Creek Basin. * WHEN...Until 545 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 234 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated that between 1 and 2 inches have rain have fallen near and along the Tonto Creek, with excessive runoff likely occurring. This could result in minor flooding across the area during the next couple of hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Punkin Center and Tonto Basin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
